stimulusHtml: If f is a differentiable function such that f(3)=8 and f ′ ( 3 ) = 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAE@ , which of the following statements could be false?
choicesHtml: lim x→3 f(x)=8 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4215@

lim x→ 3 + f(x)= lim x→ 3 − f(x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E2A@

lim x→3 f(x)−8 x−3 =5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46B6@

lim h→0 f(3+h)−8 h =5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4678@

lim x→3 f ′ (x)=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43E6@
